prompts: Create an electric-type Pokemon that resembles a sphere and has a mischievous expression.
Imagine a Pokemon that looks like a giant Pokeball but has a playful personality.
Show me a cute electric Pokemon with bright red and white colors, full of energy.
Generate a Pokemon that has a round shape and emits sparks, perfect for trainers who love electric types.

Make a Pokemon that is reminiscent of a Pokeball but has its own unique electric abilities.
